text:
Hello Alex!

Sorry for the very late reply! With what's happening with the world right now, I lost track of my work and portfolio. Thank you for the detailed feedback I really appreciate it.

Helmet:
Yeah definitely agree with you. A lot of people think that I did it in Substance Painter because overall it looks procedural and there's not much art direction in terms of storytelling. I'll have another go at it in the future in terms of materials like you said and do some experiments with it.

Still Life:
Yeah my still life is the weakest and definitely need to work on the lighting. The Grant Warwick one you sent is amazing! At the moment I'm learning lighting to make my scene dramatic and of course looking at loads of references. I just don't know what to do in terms of tweaking in regards to postproduction ie tweaking lights at compositing (Nuke) and tweaking other AOV's

Thanks again for the feedback and I really appreciate all the effort! Just a quick question, what's going to happen with creative industry in terms of the virus outbreak (corona). Do you work at home or others are still working in office? And how are you doing by the way overall?
